title: FRAUD Landlords of New Ashok Nagar
selftext:
My friend used to stay in a rented flat in New Ashok Nagar, which was taken care by this caretaker. Who steals the television from the tenants flat once the vacate the place and because of which the security money is denied and than he and other related folks won't pick your calls or messages.

Today when my friend went and demanded back her money he called 7-8 guys and fought with her friend (male) who tried to stop him from fleeing the scene in which he was hurt.

P.S. she was alone girl over there with other two friends and felt harassed when 7-8 guys came and grouped on her and still she is denied of her security money.
